mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Article(catalog_id, admin_id, title, keywords, summary, content, pub_date, click) VALUES (#{catalog_id}, #{admin_id}, #{title}, #{keywords}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{pub_date}, #{click})
mapper.select: SELECT Admin.admin_id, nickname, summary, click, content, head_img, pub_date, title, article_id, name FROM Article INNER JOIN Admin on Article.admin_id = Admin.admin_id INNER JOIN Catalog C on Article.catalog_id = C.catalog_id WHERE title LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR keywords LIKE '%${keyword}%' ORDER BY pub_date DESC
